assessment_item.data:
{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

பின்வருவனவற்றில் எது புறத்தோலின் பணி இல்லை?

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

உட்புறத் திசுக்களை பாதுகாத்தல்.

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1123"},{"text":"

வாயுக்களின் பரிமாற்றம்.

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1124"},{"text":"

மேற்புற நீராவிப் போக்கைக் குறைத்தல்.

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1139"},{"text":"

வலிமை மற்றும் மீள்தன்மையை அளித்தல்.

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:1595"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":true,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"11btu9q2-பின்வருவனவற்றில் எது புறத்தோலின் பணி இல்லை?","title":"11btu9q2-பின்வருவனவற்றில் எது புறத்தோலின் பணி இல்லை?","board":"State (Tamil Nadu)","medium":"Tamil","gradeLevel":["Class 11"],"subject":"Botany","qlevel":"EASY","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":true,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}
assessment_item.subject: Botany
